title: Replace app header icon with the attached Queen Bee logo image

requirements.text: Update the app header brand mark to use the user-provided attached image ("Queen Bee Guitar Repair 3.png") instead of the current inline SVG icon, keeping the same visual size (64x64) and layout spacing in the header.
acceptanceCriteria: The header icon is rendered from a PNG asset (not the inline SVG) and remains 64x64.
The header text layout and spacing remain unchanged (no visual jump/shift).
The icon has appropriate alt text in English (e.g., "Queen Bee Guitar Repair logo").

requirements.text: Add and wire up favicon assets derived from the attached logo so the browser tab/favicon reflects the updated branding.
acceptanceCriteria: At least one favicon link is present in frontend/index.html pointing to a generated favicon PNG in frontend/public/assets/generated/.
After rebuild, the favicon shown in the browser tab matches the attached logo artwork.

requirements.text: Store the generated branding images as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the UI (do not serve images via the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: All new/updated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The header icon and favicon load from static file paths in the built frontend.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).
Do not change backend behavior or data schema for this request.
nonGoals: No changes to Customers or Invoices features.
No redesign of colors/typography beyond what is required to swap the icon.

required: Square favicon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork (queen-bee-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
Square favicon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork (queen-bee-favicon.dim_48x48.png)
Square app icon image based on the attached crowned bee artwork (queen-bee-app-icon.dim_180x180.png)
edits: Replace the existing logo artwork with the attached crowned bee mark, centered and cleanly cropped for a square logo (queen-bee-guitar-repair-logo.dim_512x512.png > queen-bee-guitar-repair-logo.dim_512x512.png)
